field_description: for most events, this is the same as epi_event_id. for events with reporting by strain or serotype, the epi_event_id is combined with the strain or serotype (this field is generated by EHA)
inidcates if the outbreak is associated with a disease, a serotype/subtype/genotype or a more detailed strain
name of the detailed strain in english (if provided)
name of the detailed strain in french (if provided)
name of the detailed strain in spanish (if provided)
name of the serotype/subtype/genotype in english (if provided)
name of the serotype/subtype/genotype in french (if provided)
name of the serotype/subtype/genotype in spanish (if provided)
name of the disease in english (if provided)
name of the disease in french (if provided)
name of the disease in spanish (if provided)
iso code of the reporting country/territory
date of last occurrence (only relevant for recurrences)
disease of terrestrial or aquatic animals
